gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਬਛੁਰਾ ਬਿਲਲਾਤ ਮਾਤ ਮਿਲਬੇ ਕੳੁ ਬੰਧਨ ਕੈ ਬਸਿ ਕਛੁ ਬਸੁ ਨ ਬਸਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Bachhuraa Bilalaat Maat Milabay Kau , Bandhan Kai Basi Kachhu Basu N Basaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a calf writhes and wriggles to meet his mother but tethered with rope makes him helpless.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੳੁ ਬਿਗਾਰੀ ਚਾਹੈ ਭਵਨ ਗਵਨ ਕੀਓ ਪਰ ਬਸਿ ਪਰੇ ਚਿਤਵਤ ਹੀ ਬਿਹਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Bigaaree Chaahai Bhavan Gavan Keeao , Par Basi Paray Chitavat Hee Bihaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a person caught in forced or unpaid labour wants to go home and spends time planning while remaining in other's control.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਬਿਰਹਨੀ ਪ੍ਰਿਅ ਸੰਗਮ ਸਨੇਹੁ ਚਾਹੇ ਲਾਜ ਕੁਲ ਅੰਕਸ ਕੈ ਦੁਰਬਲ ਗਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Birahanee Pria Sangam Sanayhu Chaahay , Laaj Kul Ankas Kai Durabal Gaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a wife separated from her husband wants love and union but cannot do so for fear of family shame and thus loses her physical attraction.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਸੁਖ ਚਾਹੈ ਸਿਖੁ ਅਾਗਿਅਾ ਬਧ ਰਹਤ ਬਿਦੇਸ ਅਕੁਲਾਤ ਹੈ ॥੫੨੦॥
transliteration: Taisay Gur Charan Sarani Soukh Chaahai Sikhu , Aagiaa Badh Rahat Bidays Akulaat Hai ?520?
translation: Similarly a true disciple wants to enjoy the pleasures of the refuge of True Guru but bound by his command he wanders around dejectedly in another place.  (520)
